title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4622.4 - Designation of officer responsible for utilization of games of chance monies
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4622.4 - Designation of officer responsible for utilization of games of chance monies

State Regulations

The officers of a licensee shall designate an officer to
be in full charge of, and primarily responsible for, the proper utilization of
all monies derived from the conduct of games of chance in accordance with the

Games of Chance Licensing Law and this Chapter. Not less than two members shall
be responsible for counting the games of chance receipts. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4622.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
